summary: In a small city of Brazil, a woman named Flor marries a man named Vadinho, but once married she finds that he is a good-for-nothing. She works teaching cooking and he takes all of her money... See full summary »
cast: Sônia Braga|José Wilker|Mauro Mendonça|Dinorah Brillanti|Nelson Xavier|Arthur Costa Filho|Rui Resende|Mário Gusmão|Nelson Dantas|Haydil Linhares|Nilda Spencer|Sílvia Cadaval|Ivanilda Ribeiro|Sue Ribeiro|Francisco Santos|Francisco Dantas|João Gama|Alvaro Freire|Hélio Ary|Wilson Mello|Lourdes Coimbra|Miguelão|Manfredo Colassanti|Antonio Ganzarolli|Jurandyr Ferreira|Mara Rúbia|Lícia Magna|Joaquim Menezes|Orlanita Ribeiro|Antônio Victor|José Ribeiro|Cláudio Mamberti|Dita Corte Real|Marta Anderson|Eliane Rogério|Betty Lago|Marta Moyano|Gigi|Zé Anão|Heleno Lopes|Betty Faria|Fernanda de Jesus|Mercedes Ruehl
title: Doña Flor y sus dos maridos
